**曲紹介
//>&bold(){適切な文があれば、ここに投稿者コメントの最初の文を記入}
曲名：『&u(){Return to the origin}』

**歌詞
（[[ピアプロ>>https://piapro.jp/content/8gt1xl2swbkrrrxi]]より転載）

Listen to my favorite music.
Surely I should come to like you, too.
Leave here right now if I don't like it.
It is what you should accomplish now.

I listen to here, and how?
Cannot you yet come to like me?
I love punk rock with the intonation.
I listened so to only such a music so far.

There is being reliant in this music to me.
This is all which I live for.all which I live for.

Do not think that I am particular.
I take in it for a heart.
You should understand it if you do so it.
You go to listen to genuine music right now.
